item.description:
Anyone in the Cambridge area? How about a spontaneous lunch meeting at Central Kitchen?

I was there recently and overheard several people chatting en Francais at the next table. It was quiet enough in the back to have a conversation- so, if anyone can make it, I'll be there tomorrow from 1 to 2p! I have the downloaded flashcards on my laptop, and the pinyin lyrics to 2 Elva popsongs :)

Central Kitchen's a block from the REd Line T (on Mass Ave opposite PEarl St) and there's metered parking lots right behind the restaurant.

They're open from 12:30 to 2:30 for lunch i think, so if a bit earlier or later is better for you, let me know.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Wed 2/23 Central Sq lunch chat!
